original_text: The children who were born in a foreign land will return to you. You will hear them say, “This place is too small for us. Find more room for us to live in.” The children who were born in a foreign land
korean_text: 자식을 잃었을 때에 낳은 자녀가 후일에 네 귀에 말하기를 이곳이 내게 좁으니 넓혀서 내가 거주하게 하라 하리니

sentences.original_text: The children who were born in a foreign land

sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들이 말하는 것을 들을 것입니다,

sentences.original_text: "This place is too small for us.
Find more room for us to live in."
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 살 더 큰 공간을 찾아주세요."

sentences.original_text: The children who were born in a foreign land
